pageContext.claim: “Carter Page, they just used him to spy on the campaign, others they used to spy on the campaign, it's a disgrace. And it could either be unbelievable -- they don't need s special counsel.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no indication that Carter Page spied on the Trump campaign. The warrant from the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court to monitor his communications was issued after he had left the campaign, where he served as an adviser.
